import React from 'react' import Layout from '../core/Layout' import {isAuthenticated} from '../auth/auth' import '../css/dashboard.css' const Dashboard = () =>{ const {user:{_id,name,email,role}} = isAuthenticated() return (

User Information

  • {name}
  • {email}
  • {role===1 ? "Admin":"Registered user"}

Purchase history

  • history
 ) } export default Dashboard
